Eileen Wagner

Open data. Open access. Open minds.

Open Knowledge Foundation Deutschland

I am Content Manager at Code for Germany and Open Budgets EU. I enjoy telling people about all things open.

I studied philosophy at Trinity College, Cambridge and logic at the Institute for Logic, Language and Computation in Amsterdam.

I am originally from Berlin, where I attended the John F. Kennedy School.

Here is my site at Academia.edu. You can find me on Ello. I also tweet.
